name: Xenon OS
description:
This is not an actual OS, it just emulates one.

tips:

press a number 0-5 to change color on the paint app

press - or = to decrease/increase paint size!

system requirements:

recommended; 300mb ram, i3 (or higher) with at least 2 cores at 1.8GHz clock or higher.

minimum: 200mb ram, i3 with at least 2 cores at 1GHz clock or higher.
